alert.note: Alert for Central Tangipahoa; East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; Northern Livingston; Northern St. Tammany; Northern Tangipahoa; St. Helena; Washington; West Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 10:35PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern West Feliciana, St. Helena, northwestern St. Tammany, northern Livingston, East Feliciana, Tangipahoa, northern East Baton Rouge, Washington Parishes in southeastern Louisiana and southwestern Pearl River Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1035 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Mount Herman to near Norwood. Movement was south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Zachary, Baker, Bogalusa, Franklinton, Jackson, Clinton, Greensburg, Amite, Amite City, Kentwood, Independence, Varnado, Roseland, Slaughter, Folsom, Wilson, Sun, Osyka, Norwood and Montpelier. This includes Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 35 and 66. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Tangipahoa; East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; Northern Livingston; Northern St. Tammany; Northern Tangipahoa; St. Helena; Washington; West Feliciana
